channel.title: Blackbarrage - Balanced Economy - Ge - Need staff - 30+ Bosses - Join today!
channel.description:
[size=36pt][shadow=red,left]Blackbarrage[/shadow][/size]
Links Home: http://www.blackbarrage.enjin.com forum: http://blackbarrage.enjin.com/forum Download Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0h7p3m4i3eijhxe/Blackbarrage718Clientt.jar?dl=0
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/21buloj.png[/img] [size=36pt][shadow=blue,left]Introducing Blackbarrage[/shadow][/size] Blackbarrage has been around for a long time we started in 2009 with a 317 server most of you guys might remember us. We slowly moved up in played and Released new updates everyday. Things happen and sadly Blackbarrage had to close the doors in 2011. NOW WERE BACK! We are bigger and better then ever coming out with a Brand new 718 server. Hoping people remember us and are ready to pickup where we left off. We take pride in having friendly and helpful staff. We hope to see you guys soon thanks!
Blackbarrage is currently looking for staff. Bellow is the current staff. Owner: Tyler (me) Co-Owner: Speedy Admin: Non mod: Kingleeko Player support: None
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Features On Blackbarrage![/shadow][/size] - Starter Packs (Coins , Armor , Etc.. - Loyalty Points (Auras - Custom yell titles - Rusty coins - Crystal Chest - Squeal of Fortune - Vote For Spins - Forums - Friends List - Friend Chat - Private Chat - Commands - Skill Capes - Donator Area - Completionist Cape and Max cape and 200m Capes - Report Abuse - 100% Soulwars working like RuneScape! - Item Lending working 100% - Dragonfire Shield with Special Attack! - Godwars with Killcount Needed to pass to next stage! - Flowering & Dicing for Hosting Gambling - Pest Control Working Exactly Like RuneScape (100%) - Custom Dungeoneering System - Recipe for Disaster - Dominion Tower with Dominion Factor Points & Shop. - Duel Arena Working just Like RuneScape - Glacors with Working Minions & Double HP Bars - Teleport Hub System (Talk to Tree to Teleport Around) - All Bosses with good Drop Rates - Server Notified when Users get a good Drop - Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins. - Warrior Guild with Defender Drops - Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape - Nice ways to make money - Much much more come online to find out more! - Fight Caves (63 Waves) - Fight Kiln (36 Waves) - Grand Exchange - Clan Chat System - Dungeoneering - Working Notes -Full Godwars- Bandos, Sara, Nex, Etc -30+ Bosses -15+ Minigames -RuneSpan Added -Soqual of Fortune 100% -100% Clan Wars -Working Anti-Dupe System -Fairy Rings working -lodestone 100% [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Dungeons[/shadow][/size] - Kuradal’s Dungeon - Edgeville Dungeon - Karamja Dungeon - Brimhaven Dungeon - Taverley Dungeon [size=14pt][shadow=blue,left]Bosses[/shadow][/size] - Kalphite Queen - King Black Dragon - Queen Black Dragon - God Wars - Barrows - Corp (Working Drops) - Kalphite queen - Tormented demons (Dragon claws) - Bork - Barrelchests - Dagannoth kings [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Minigames[/shadow][/size] - Duel Arena - Soul wars - Fight Kiln - Pest Control - Barrows - Recipe for Disaster - Real Dungeoneering (Just like Runescape!) - Fight Kiln - Castle Wars - RuneSpan - Fight Caves - Dominion Tower - Warriors Guild [size=14pt][shadow=blue,left]Melee[/shadow][/size] - Bronze, Iron, Steel, Black, Mithril, Adamant, Rune Armour & Weapons - All Dragon Weapons - Full Dragon Armour Set - Barrows Weapons/Armour Sets - God Weapons/Armour Sets - Chaotic Weapons - Defenders [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Prayer[/shadow][/size] - All Prayers - Gilded Altar - Auto Prayer (Click on Bone Click on Alter does it on its own [size=14pt][shadow=blue,left]Magic[/shadow][/size] - Ancients/Ice Barrage - Ancient Staff - Lunars/Vengeance - God Capes/Staffs/Spells - Mystic Robes - Infinity Robes - Staff of Light - Chaotic Staff - Alchemy [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Ranged[/shadow][/size] - Bows/Arrows - Crossbows/Dragon Bolts - Karil’s Xbow/Bolt Racks - Hand Cannon - Chaotic Crossbow - Royal Dragonhide sets [size=14pt][shadow=blue,left]Summoning[/shadow][/size] - All Familiars - Charm Drops (Rock Crabs) - Obelisks [size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Slayer[/shadow][/size] - Tasks - Slayer Tower - Kuradal’s Dungeon
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Agility[/shadow][/size] - Gnome Agility Course - Barbarian Agility Course - Brimhaven Agility Arena - Wilderness Agility Course - Shortcuts
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Runecrafting[/shadow][/size] - Altars/Talismans - Rune Essence Mine - Abyss/Mage of Zamorak - Essence Pouches
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Mining[/size][/shadow] - Smelting Bars / Smithing Equipment - Copper, Tin, Iron, Coal, Gold, Mithril, Adamant Ores - Rune Essence Mine - Dragon Pickaxe
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Woodcutting[/shadow][/size] - Fletching - Firemaking - Birds Nests
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Crafting[/shadow][/size] - Gem Cutting - Flax Picking - Spinning Wheel - Tanning - Armour Crafting - Jewellery Smithing
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Fishing[/size][/shadow] - Cooking - Fly Fishing - Lobsters - Shark
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Thieving[/size][/shadow] - Pickpocketing - Master Farmer - Stalls
[shadow=blue,left][size=14pt]Herblore[/size][/shadow] - Stat Boosting Potions - Restorative Potions - Antifire / Antipoison Potions - Weapon Poison
[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Farming[/shadow][/size] - Tree & Herb Seeds - Flax Picking - Bowstring making!
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Hunter [/size][/shadow] - Luring - Trap Setting - Butterfly Net
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Construction[/size][/shadow] - Workbench - Sawmill*
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Training Teleports[/size][/shadow] - Rock Crabs - Black Demons - Armoured Zombies - Yaks - Mature Grotworms

item.title: Blackbarrage - Balanced Economy - Ge - Need staff - 30+ Bosses - Join today!
item.dc:creator: @Twd1995 Twd1995
item.description:
@Twd1995 wrote:

Yes boomscape is the source. It isn’t just about the source, Its about Blackbarrage IS BACK!! We were doing so good back in 2009… But that’s okay we back and were better then ever almost hitting 30 players last night I guess people really do remember us. People say im an amazing owner and my staff are very friendly which I love… Some of the updates so far is been really focusing on pking. Trying to convert the server to fit both groups of players, Maybe make 2 Versions or just add pking store and everything to the main base. We are also adding a lot of customs like, Rainbow phat etc… Not you had an idea on what you would like to see. Please go to our forums and let me know thanks,
Tyler

Read full topic

item.title: Blackbarrage - Balanced Economy - Ge - Need staff - 30+ Bosses - Join today!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

Twd1995:

Thanks guys for the feedback. We have had daily updates and new content daily. We have moved the home and shops to new places. WE ARE BACK! Hoping to get some old players. You might say oh well its just like any other 718 server… Well you would be wrong we are working on updates that will blow your mind… We hit 25 players yesterday!! We are moving good lets keep growing

what updates cuz it looks 100% like boomscape

Read full topic

                                                       [size=36pt][shadow=red,left]Blackbarrage[/shadow][/size]

[size=36pt][shadow=blue,left]Introducing Blackbarrage[/shadow][/size]
Blackbarrage has been around for a long time we started in 2009 with a 317 server most of you guys might remember us. We slowly moved up in played and Released new updates everyday. Things happen and sadly Blackbarrage had to close the doors in 2011. NOW WERE BACK! We are bigger and better then ever coming out with a Brand new 718 server. Hoping people remember us and are ready to pickup where we left off. We take pride in having friendly and helpful staff. We hope to see you guys soon thanks!

Blackbarrage is currently looking for staff. Bellow is the current staff.
Owner: Tyler (me)
Co-Owner: Speedy
Admin: Non
mod: Kingleeko
Player support: None

[size=14pt][shadow=red,left]Features On Blackbarrage![/shadow][/size]

  • Starter Packs (Coins , Armor , Etc…
  • Loyalty Points (Auras - Custom yell titles
  • Rusty coins
  • Crystal Chest
  • Squeal of Fortune
  • Vote For Spins
  • Forums

  • Private Chat
  • Commands
  • Skill Capes
  • Donator Area
  • Completionist Cape and Max cape and 200m Capes
  • Report Abuse
  • 100% Soulwars working like RuneScape!
  • Item Lending working 100%
  • Dragonfire Shield with Special Attack!
  • Godwars with Killcount Needed to pass to next stage!
  • Flowering & Dicing for Hosting Gambling
  • Pest Control Working Exactly Like RuneScape (100%)
  • Custom Dungeoneering System
  • Recipe for Disaster
  • Dominion Tower with Dominion Factor Points & Shop.
  • Duel Arena Working just Like RuneScape
  • Glacors with Working Minions & Double HP Bars
  • Teleport Hub System (Talk to Tree to Teleport Around)
  • All Bosses with good Drop Rates
  • Server Notified when Users get a good Drop
  • Squeal Of Fortune Working 100% Like RuneScape Showing Bought, Earned & Daily Spins.
  • Warrior Guild with Defender Drops
  • Castle Wars working exactly like RuneScape
  • Nice ways to make money
  • Much much more come online to find out more!
  • Fight Caves (63 Waves)
